== Halkurke (611978) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Halkurke is a village in the [[Tiptur ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 1138.14 hectares and harbouring 721 households with total population of 2984 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Tiptur]] is at a distance of 14 km. Male population is 1486 and female population is 1498. Scheduled Caste Population is 494 and Scheduled Tribes population is 286. Census Location Code of the village is 611978<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
